title: Community Awareness Support Education Through Social Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with fundamental online learning tools
context.additional_context: Learners experience improving learning design through interaction with peers using a social learning platform. Emphasis is placed on strengthening community awareness by combining online and offline activities

learning_goals: Learners can analyze peers' learning activities and assess community capabilities using a socially designed learning platform.
Learners can provide feedback on peers' instructional designs and perform collaborative improvements using a community dashboard.
Learners can visualize the instructional design process using tools based on the Cultural-Historical Activity Theory (CHAT) framework.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
